links.title: How Toys 'R' Us Collapsed So Quickly
links.description: After sustaining a crushing load of debt for more than a decade following its 2005 buyout, Toys ''R'' Us Inc. succumbed to what it called a "dangerous game of dominoes" that toppled it in a matter of days.

message.body: In 2009, Mercedes bought 9% of $TSLA for $50 million. They sold it in 2014 for a $780M gain. The same stake is worth $6 billion today.
